snippet: Jose Evrard's left-wing credentials were impeccable. His great-uncle Victor, he recounts with pride, was a French communist executed by the Nazis; his father worked in a coal mine; Evrard himself was a card-carrying French communist for 36 years....

headline.main: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports
headline.print_headline: Libya's NOC Reviewed Loading Schedules After Clashes Near Oil Ports

lead_paragraph: Jose Evrard's left-wing credentials were impeccable. His great-uncle Victor, he recounts with pride, was a French communist executed by the Nazis; his father worked in a coal mine; Evrard himself was a card-carrying French communist for 36 years.
